sources.title: The Man Who Died Twice (1958)
sources.description: Rod Cameron, Vera Ralston, Mike Mazurki Republic Pictures

metadata.Plot: A nightclub singer loses her husband in an automobile accident, and soon afterward witnesses the murders of two narcotics agents, and suffers a nervous breakdown. The police come to believe that all three murders are related, as they had suspected her husband was involved in a heroin smuggling ring, and now they think she may have been involved in it - especially after they find a large stash of heroin hidden in her apartment.
metadata.Actors: Rod Cameron, Vera Ralston, Mike Mazurki
